name: 3. Mountains Ablaze.
description:
"To truly appreciated the magnitude of an event such as this, without having seen it with ones own eyes, I don't really think is possible. These were beyond your standard "Bush-Fires", our entire valley community was swept over by a firestorm of epic proportions. Like a wave washing over sand, leaving everything in its path in a new form. Our mountains burned for days on end, rain forest that has never and maybe should never have burned. Nothing ever like it, and hopefully never again."

Photography by Jay Moon, during the Australian wildfires; November 2019.
#3 of 15.
All funds generated go toward the ongoing recovery.
